issue.title: Remove CI directives from squashed commit messages
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2185](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2185). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In our PR squash tool, we are potentially picking up CI directives like `[skip appveyor]` from intermediate commits. We should regex these away and instead use directives in the PR title if we wish the commit to master to behave in a certain way
